eu.amidst.core.utils

Class MultinomialIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.utils.MultinomialIndex

  • public final class MultinomialIndex
extends java.lang.Object

    This class implements various static methods useful when indexing arrays of distributions involving multinomial variables.

    Since:
    2014-11-4
    Version:
    1.0

      • getIndexFromVariableAssignment

        public static int getIndexFromVariableAssignment(java.util.List<Variable> vars,
                                                 Assignment assignment)
        Computes the order of an assignment when indexing the set of possible values for a set of multinomial variables.

        Example: Let X, Y and Z three multinomial variables with states {0,1}, {0,1} and {0,1,2} respectively. Then, they are indexed as: X Y Z Index 0 0 0 0 1 0 0 1 0 1 0 2 1 1 0 3 0 0 1 4 1 0 1 5 0 1 1 6 1 1 1 7 0 0 2 8 1 0 2 9 0 1 2 10 1 1 2 11 So, for instance Index(0,0,2) = 8.

        Parameters:
        vars - A List of variables.
        assignment - A Assignment for a set of variables.
        Returns:
        The index of the corresponding assignment among the possible ones.

      • getIndexFromVariableAssignment

        public static int getIndexFromVariableAssignment(java.util.List<Variable> vars,
                                                 double[] assignment)
        Computes the order of an assignment when indexing the set of possible values for a set of multinomial variables.
        Parameters:
        vars - A List of variables.
        assignment - An array of double with the values of variables in the same order.
        Returns:
        The index of the corresponding assignment among the possible ones.

      • getIndexFromVariableAssignment

        public static int getIndexFromVariableAssignment(java.util.List<Variable> vars,
                                                 java.util.List<java.lang.Double> assignment)
        Computes the order of an assignment when indexing the set of possible values for a set of multinomial variables.
        Parameters:
        vars - A List of variables.
        assignment - A List of double values for the variables in the same order.
        Returns:
        The index of the corresponding assignment among the possible ones.

        Returns:

      • getVariableArrayAssignmentFromIndex

        public static double[] getVariableArrayAssignmentFromIndex(java.util.List<Variable> vars,
                                                           int index)
        Computes the variable assignment located in a given position.
        Parameters:
        vars - A List of variables.
        index - The position of the Assignment.
        Returns:
        An array of double with the values of the variables representing the assignment.
